system.description: When you refuse to honor a Debt, roll with the difference in Status between you and your creditor.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you can't avoid the noose: either honor the Debt in full or erase all the Debts owed to you by their Circle and take a -1 ongoing to Status with their Circle until after time passes.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, you weasel out of the obligation for now, but you still owe the Debt. On a 7-9, you owe them an additional Debt or mark corruption, your choice.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, you weasel out of the obligation for now, but you still owe the Debt.
